name: 维杰·安东尼
introduction: Vijay Antony (born 24 July 1975) is an Indian music composer, playback singer and an actor in the Tamil film industry. Vijay Antony is growing rapidly in Tamil film industry. Not only as Music director but also as a successful actor, while his skills as a Musician is well know in Nakka Mukka. The Naan actor has a manged to win many hearts showcasing his talent as an actor with his first film Naan and his second film Salim doing well at the box office, everyone's attention is now on his next film as an actor. First two films begin an action triller, has third is touted to be a Comedy entertainer with an eye catching title ,India Pakistan has manged to created decent expectation, having expressed his desire to-do different kinds of the roles. The composer turned actor is all set to star in his next venture which is titled pichaikkaran. The film will directed by Sasi (director). Vijay Antony will also produce under his banner and scoring the Music for the film.[1][2]Sasi (director) who introduced Vijay Antony as a music director in his film Dishyum
